item.title: Testing Kubernetes and infrastructure as code with Sid Palas (k6 Office Hours)
item.description: For this week’s k6 Office Hours, Simme and I had Sid Palas from DevOps Directive come on board to talk about what Kubernetes is, how it relates to Infrastructure as Code, and why either of those should matter to testers.
